panels.description:
Satisfactory: not 5xx and <=0.3s,
Tolerable: not 5xx and <=1.2s

https://medium.com/@tristan_96324/prometheus-apdex-alerting-d17a065e39d0

targets.expr:
(
    sum(increase(
        label_replace(
            traefik_service_request_duration_seconds_bucket{service=~"$namespace-.+", service=~"$service", code!~"5..", le="0.3"}
        , "namespace", "$1", "service", "([a-z]+)-.+")
    [$__range]))
    +
    sum(increase(
        label_replace(
            traefik_service_request_duration_seconds_bucket{service=~"$namespace-.+", service=~"$service", code!~"5xx", le="1.2"}
        , "namespace", "$1", "service", "([a-z]+)-.+")
    [$__range]))
) / 2
/ 
sum(increase(
    label_replace(
        traefik_service_request_duration_seconds_bucket{service=~"$namespace-.+", service=~"$service", le="+Inf"}
    , "namespace", "$1", "service", "([a-z]+)-.+")
[$__range]))

panels.title: Apdex Score

targets.expr:
(
sum(increase(traefik_service_request_duration_seconds_bucket{service=~"$namespace-.+", service=~"$service", le="+Inf"}[$__range]))
-
sum(increase(traefik_service_request_duration_seconds_bucket{service=~"$namespace-.+", service=~"$service", le="$slow_threshold"}[$__range]))
)
/
sum(increase(traefik_service_request_duration_seconds_bucket{service=~"$namespace-.+", service=~"$service", le="+Inf"}[$__range]))

panels.description:
Satisfactory: not 5xx and <=0.3s,
Tolerable: not 5xx and <=1.2s

https://medium.com/@tristan_96324/prometheus-apdex-alerting-d17a065e39d0

targets.expr:
(
    sum by ($group_by) (increase(
        label_replace(
            traefik_service_request_duration_seconds_bucket{service=~"$namespace-.+", service=~"$service", code!~"5..", le="0.3"}
        , "namespace", "$1", "service", "([a-z]+)-.+")
    [$__rate_interval]))
    +
    sum by ($group_by) (increase(
        label_replace(
            traefik_service_request_duration_seconds_bucket{service=~"$namespace-.+", service=~"$service", code!~"5..", le="1.2"}
        , "namespace", "$1", "service", "([a-z]+)-.+")
    [$__rate_interval]))
) / 2
/ 
sum by ($group_by) (increase(
    label_replace(
        traefik_service_request_duration_seconds_bucket{service=~"$namespace-.+", service=~"$service", le="+Inf"}
    , "namespace", "$1", "service", "([a-z]+)-.+")
[$__rate_interval]))

panels.title: Apdex Score

targets.expr:
(
sum(increase(traefik_service_request_duration_seconds_bucket{service=~"$namespace-.+", service=~"$service", le="+Inf"}[$__rate_interval]))
-
sum by (le) (increase(traefik_service_request_duration_seconds_bucket{service=~"$namespace-.+", service=~"$service", le!="+Inf"}[$__rate_interval]))
)
/
sum(increase(traefik_service_request_duration_seconds_bucket{service=~"$namespace-.+", service=~"$service", le="+Inf"}[$__rate_interval]))

(
sum(rate(traefik_service_request_duration_seconds_bucket{service=~"$namespace-.+", service=~"$service", le="+Inf"}[$__rate_interval]))
-
sum by (le) (rate(traefik_service_request_duration_seconds_bucket{service=~"$namespace-.+", service=~"$service", le!="+Inf"}[$__rate_interval]))
)

sum by ($group_by) (
    label_replace(
        rate(
          traefik_service_requests_total{service=~"$namespace-.+", service=~"$service", code=~"5.."}
      [$__rate_interval])
    , "namespace", "$1", "service", "^([a-z]+)-.+")
)
/
sum by ($group_by) (
    label_replace(
        rate(
          traefik_service_requests_total{service=~"$namespace-.+", service=~"$service"}
      [$__rate_interval])
    , "namespace", "$1", "service", "^([a-z]+)-.+")
)

sum by ($group_by) (
    label_replace(
        increase(
          traefik_service_requests_total{service=~"$namespace-.+", service=~"$service", code=~"5.."}
      [$__rate_interval])
    , "namespace", "$1", "service", "^([a-z]+)-.+")
)

sum by ($group_by) (
    label_replace(
        rate(
          traefik_service_requests_total{service=~"$namespace-.+", service=~"$service", code=~"3.."}
      [$__rate_interval])
    , "namespace", "$1", "service", "^([a-z]+)-.+")
)
/
sum by ($group_by) (
    label_replace(
        rate(
          traefik_service_requests_total{service=~"$namespace-.+", service=~"$service"}
      [$__rate_interval])
    , "namespace", "$1", "service", "^([a-z]+)-.+")
)

sum by ($group_by) (
    label_replace(
        increase(
          traefik_service_requests_total{service=~"$namespace-.+", service=~"$service", code=~"3.."}
      [$__rate_interval])
    , "namespace", "$1", "service", "^([a-z]+)-.+")
)

sum by ($group_by) (
    label_replace(
        rate(
          traefik_service_requests_total{service=~"$namespace-.+", service=~"$service", code=~"4.."}
      [$__rate_interval])
    , "namespace", "$1", "service", "^([a-z]+)-.+")
)
/
sum by ($group_by) (
    label_replace(
        rate(
          traefik_service_requests_total{service=~"$namespace-.+", service=~"$service"}
      [$__rate_interval])
    , "namespace", "$1", "service", "^([a-z]+)-.+")
)

sum by ($group_by) (
    label_replace(
        increase(
          traefik_service_requests_total{service=~"$namespace-.+", service=~"$service", code=~"4.."}
      [$__rate_interval])
    , "namespace", "$1", "service", "^([a-z]+)-.+")
)
